meanings.definition: A large, herbivorous aquatic mammal with a rounded body and paddle-like flippers.
meanings.sent1: The manatee swam gracefully in the water.
meanings.sent2: I saw a manatee at the aquarium last weekend.
meanings.sent3: The manatee decided to take a nap on the sandy ocean floor.
meanings.sent4: The manatee's gentle nature reminded me of a peaceful giant.
meanings.sent5: Children were excited to see the manatee up close during the field trip.

meanings.definition: A slow-moving marine mammal found in warm coastal waters.
meanings.sent1: We spotted a manatee lazily floating near the shore.
meanings.sent2: The manatee's movements were unhurried and relaxed.
meanings.sent3: The manatee seemed to be enjoying a leisurely swim in the sun.
meanings.sent4: The manatee's pace matched the calm rhythm of the ocean waves.
meanings.sent5: Tourists were delighted to catch a glimpse of the peaceful manatee.
